Sujong Jeong is a professor of climate science at the Seoul National University. His research focuses on global carbon cycle by utilizing various measurements, process-based models, and AI. 

## Education
- [PhD in Atmospheric Science]{.fw-bold} | Seoul National University | 2010

## Professional Experience
2018 – present Professor, Seoul National University
2023 – present Principal Investigator, Korea Carbon Project (https://www.korea-carbon-project.org), South Korea
2023 – present Director, Climate Tech Center, Seoul National University
